title: No condonation in the required open spaces, parking and other requirement prescribed in the regulations shall be allowed in case of additional FSI
clause_text: No condonation in the required open spaces, parking and other requirement prescribed in the regulations shall be allowed in case of additional FSI.
section: Additional FSI to Biotechnology Units / Park
